column4: 9 a.m. to 12 p.m. - Three lanes inbound and one lane outbound.
12 p.m. to 3 p.m. - Normal lane configuration.
3 p.m. to 5:30 p.m. - Three lanes outbound and one lane inbound.
Alumni Dr is ONE WAY from the stadium to Nicholasville Rd.

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
column4: All traffic on Alumni from the stadium must turn right on Tates Creek Rd

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
column4: All outbound Tates Creek traffic approaching from Cooper Dr must turn left onto Alumni Dr.
